member.name: M:Atom.BaseTaskManager.LockTaskAsync(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{System.Boolean}},System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Runs the task if the updating flag is not set. If the flag is true (indicating the task is already running) then the task is not run. If the flag is false (indicating no running task) then the task is run. Once the task is finished if it was run, then the flag is reset to false. NOTE: This method doesn't queue tasks, it only prevents them from running!
member.param: The boolean property flag defining if the task is already running
The task to run if it's not already running

member.name: M:Atom.BaseTaskManager.LockTaskAsync``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{System.Boolean}},System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}},``0)
member.summary: Runs the task if the updating flag is not set. If the flag is true (indicating the task is already running) then the task is not run. If the flag is false (indicating no running task) then the task is run. Once the task is finished if it was run, then the flag is reset to false NOTE: This method doesn't queue tasks, it only prevents them from running!
member.typeparam: The type of the return value of the task
member.param: The boolean property flag defining if the task is already running
The task to run if it's not already running
The default value to return if the task is already running

member.name: M:Atom.ITaskManager.LockTaskAsync(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{System.Boolean}},System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Runs the task if the updating flag is not set. If the flag is true (indicating the task is already running) then the task is not run. If the flag is false (indicating no running task) then the task is run. Once the task is finished if it was run, then the flag is reset to false. NOTE: This method doesn't queue tasks, it only prevents them from running!
member.param: The boolean property flag defining if the task is already running
The task to run if it's not already running

NOTE: This method doesn't queue tasks, it only prevents them from running!
member.typeparam: The type of the return value of the task
member.param: The boolean property flag defining if the task is already running
The task to run if it's not already running
The default value to return if the task is already running

member.name: M:Atom.StringHelpers.Singularize(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a plural English word to its singular form. The method handles both regular and some irregular plural forms.
member.param: The plural word to be converted.
member.returns: The singular form of the input word. If no rule applies, the original word is returned.

member.name: M:Atom.StringHelpers.Pluralize(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to pluralize the specified according to the rules of the English language.
member.remarks:
This function attempts to pluralize as many words as practical by following these rules:
Words that end with "y" (but not with a vowel preceding the y) are pluralized by replacing the "y" with "ies".
Words that end with "us", "ss", "x", "ch" or "sh" are pluralized by adding "es" to the end of the text.
Words that end with "f" or "fe" are pluralized by replacing the "f(e)" with "ves".
member.returns: A string that consists of the text in its pluralized form.
